mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_CONTENT, RS.MEMBER_ID, BR.BOARD_NO, BR.POSITION, BR.EXPR_PERIOD, BR.EMPL_TYPE, BR.EMPL_CNDT,BR.ENTR_EXAM,BR.JOB_TYPE, BR.BENEFIT, CP.CMPN_NO, CP.MEMBER_ID AS CMPN_ID, CP.CMPN_NM, CP.CMPN_ADDR, CP.CMPN_LOGO,CP.CMPN_INTRO,CP.CMPN_MCOUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN BOARD_RECRUIT BR ON B.BOARD_NO = BR.BOARD_NO JOIN RESUME RS ON RS."POSITION" = BR."POSITION" JOIN COMPANY CP ON BR.CMPN_NO = CP.CMPN_NO WHERE ( (#{question1} = BR."POSITION" AND #{question2} = BR.EXPR_PERIOD) OR (#{question1} = BR."POSITION" AND #{question4} = BR.EMPL_TYPE) OR (#{question1} = BR."POSITION" AND #{question5} = CP.CMPN_ADDR) OR (#{question2} = BR.EXPR_PERIOD AND #{question4} = BR.EMPL_TYPE) OR (#{question2} = BR.EXPR_PERIOD AND #{question5} = CP.CMPN_ADDR) OR (#{question4} = BR.EMPL_TYPE AND #{question5} = CP.CMPN_ADDR) ) AND RS.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
